Class TaskStreamingInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iu.dsc.tws.executor.core.streaming.TaskStreamingInstance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    INodeInstance, ISync

    public class TaskStreamingInstance
extends java.lang.Object
implements INodeInstance, ISync
    The class represents the instance of the executing task
